name: ada
description: Ada & SPARK IntelliSense, code browsing, debugging and more.

semanticTokenModifiers.description: Annotates a variable with the executable's lifetime
Annotates a variable that is local to the code block

ada.projectFile.markdownDescription:
GPR project file (*.gpr) for this workspace.

It is recommended to set this to a relative path starting at the root of the workspace.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists.

ada.gprConfigurationFile.markdownDescription:
GPR configuration file (*.cgpr) for this workspace.

It is recommended to set this to a relative path starting at the root of the workspace.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists.

ada.scenarioVariables.markdownDescription:
Scenario variables to apply to the GPR project file.

This value should be provided as an object where the property names are GPR scenario variables and the values are strings.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists.

ada.defaultCharset.markdownDescription:
The character set that the Ada Language Server should use when reading files from disk.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists.

ada.relocateBuildTree.markdownDescription:
The path to a directory used for out-of-tree builds. This feature is related to the [--relocate-build-tree GPRbuild command line switch](https://docs.adacore.com/gprbuild-docs/html/gprbuild_ug/building_with_gprbuild.html#switches).

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists.

ada.rootDir.markdownDescription:
This setting must be used in conjunction with the `relocateBuildTree` setting.

It specifies the root directory for artifact relocation. It corresponds to the [--root-dir GPRbuild command line switch](https://docs.adacore.com/gprbuild-docs/html/gprbuild_ug/building_with_gprbuild.html#switches).

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.useGnatformat.markdownDescription:
Enable GNATformat as the formatting provider for Ada source files.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.onTypeFormatting.indentOnly.markdownDescription:
If the VS Code `editor.formatOnType` setting is enabled, the Ada Language Server will format Ada code while it is being typed in the editor, in particular when a new line is typed.

This setting controls whether formatting should only perform the indentation of the new line (true) or also format the previous line (false).

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.rangeFormattingFallback.markdownDescription:
Enable fallback indenter in case the file is not syntactically correct.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

ada.showNotificationsOnErrors.markdownDescription: Whether to show error notifications in VS Code for failing LSP requests.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Default style, based on GNAT coding standard with some enhancements.
Documentation for the entities extracted from the comments before the entity declaration.
Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `"gnat"`.
ada.documentationStyle.markdownDescription:
Controls the primary documentation style of entities.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `"gnat"`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Never list overriding and/or overridden subprograms.
List overriding and/or overridden subprograms on dispatching calls and on abstract subprogram declarations.
List overriding and/or overridden subprograms on declarations only.
Always list overriding and/or overridden subprograms when possible.
Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `"usage_and_abstract_only"`.
ada.displayMethodAncestryOnNavigation.markdownDescription:
Controls the policy for displaying overriding and overridden subprograms on navigation requests such as 'Go To Definition' or 'Go To Implementations'.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `"usage_and_abstract_only"`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.foldComments.markdownDescription:
Controls whether comments should be folded like code blocks.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

ada.namedNotationThreshold.markdownDescription:
Defines the number of parameters/components beyond which named notation is used for completion snippets.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `3`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.useCompletionSnippets.markdownDescription:
Enable snippets in completion results (e.g. subprogram calls).

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.insertWithClauses.markdownDescription:
Enable insertion of missing with-clauses when accepting completion for invisible symbols.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `false`.
ada.renameInComments.markdownDescription:
Enable editing Ada comments to update references to an entity when it is being renamed.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `false`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.projectDiagnostics.markdownDescription:
Controls whether or not the Ada Language Server should emit diagnostics related to project loading into the VS Code Problems view.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.alireDiagnostics.markdownDescription:
Controls whether or not the Ada Language Server should emit diagnostics related to alire into the VS Code Problems view.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.sourceInfoDiagnostics.markdownDescription:
Controls whether or not the Ada Language Server should emit source information diagnostics (e.g: for opened files that do not belong to the loaded project tree).

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.adaFileDiagnostics.markdownDescription:
Controls whether or not the Ada Language Server should emit diagnostics related to the edition of Ada files into the VS Code Problems view.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.gprFileDiagnostics.markdownDescription:
Controls whether or not the Ada Language Server should emit diagnostics related to the edition of GPR files into the VS Code Problems view.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.enableIndexing.markdownDescription:
Controls whether the Ada Language Server should index the source files immediately after loading a project.

If set to false, indexing will be deferred to the time when an action requiring the index is first performed, e.g. hovering over a referenced entity to get its documentation.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Provided by [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) if it exists at the workspace root, otherwise defaults to `true`.
ada.followSymlinks.markdownDescription:
Controls the Ada Language Server normalizes the file paths received from the client.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

enumDescriptions: Brief traces are emitted for each request sent and each response received.
Verbose traces are emitted for each request sent and each response received, including the message content.
ada.trace.server.markdownDescription: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Ada language server in the 'Ada Language Server' Output view.

enumDescriptions: Brief traces are emitted for each request sent and each response received.
Verbose traces are emitted for each request sent and each response received, including the message content.
gpr.trace.server.markdownDescription: Traces the communication between VS Code and the GPR language server in the 'GPR Language Server' Output view.

ada.logThreshold.markdownDescription:
Controls the maximum number of trace files preserved in the ALS log directory (which defaults to `~/.als`). When this threshold is reached, old trace files get deleted automatically. The default number of preserved trace files is `10`.

If not set in VS Code, this setting takes its value from the [`.als.json`](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/blob/master/doc/settings.md) file at the root of the workspace, if that file exists. Otherwise it defaults to `10`.

ada.enableExperimentalFeatures.description: Enable experimental features still in development.

e3-testsuite.python.description: Path to python interpreter, useful when you want to use a specific venv

e3-testsuite.args.description: Command line arguments to pass to testsuite.py when running tests

command.description: The name of the command to call.

args.description: The arguments to pass to the command.

compound.description: List of task names to be executed sequentially.

configuration.deprecationMessage: The task property 'configuration' is deprecated. Instead, use the properties 'command' and 'args' to configure the task.

enumDescriptions: Run semantic checks on an Ada file
Build a main program specified in a GPR project
Run a main program specified in a GPR project
Run a build task and a run task in sequence for a given main program

oneOf.$comment: Each oneOf is evaluated regardless of the parent schema. That's why valid properties of the parent must be repeated here in order to be allowed.
Each oneOf is evaluated regardless of the parent schema. That's why valid properties of the parent must be repeated here in order to be allowed.
Each oneOf is evaluated regardless of the parent schema. That's why valid properties of the parent must be repeated here in order to be allowed.

mainArgs.description: Arguments passed to the main executable invocation

oneOf.$comment: Each oneOf is evaluated regardless of the parent schema. That's why valid properties of the parent must be repeated here in order to be allowed.

buildTask.description: Name of the task that builds the main executable

runTask.description: Name of the task that runs the main executable

command.description: The name of the command to call.

args.description: The arguments to pass to the command.

compound.description: List of task names to be executed sequentially.

taskKind.deprecationMessage: The task type "gnat" is deprecated. Use task type "ada" or "spark" instead.

args.deprecationMessage: The task type "gnat" is deprecated. Use task type "ada" or "spark" instead.

projectFile.deprecationMessage: The task type "gpr" is deprecated. Use task type "ada" instead.

main.deprecationMessage: The task type "gpr" is deprecated. Use task type "ada" instead.

executable.deprecationMessage: The task type "gpr" is deprecated. Use task type "ada" instead.

Add Missing Source Directories To Workspace

walkthroughs.title: Get Started with Ada & SPARK
walkthroughs.description: A brief introduction of Ada & SPARK support in VS Code

steps.title: Install development tools
steps.description:
Install an Ada compiler to execute your source code.
[Install a Compiler](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/tree/master/integration/vscode/ada#getting-additional-tools)

steps.title: Open a VS Code workspace
steps.description:
Create a new folder or use an existing one, and open it with VS Code.
[Open Folder](command:vscode.openFolder)

steps.title: Setup a project
steps.description:
If you don't already have a GPR project, create one!
[Create a Hello World Project](command:toSide:ada.createHelloWorldProject)

steps.title: Navigate and edit your code
steps.description:
Open an Ada source file to explore features.
[Open an Ada Source File](command:workbench.action.quickOpen?%22.ad%22)

steps.title: Build your project
steps.description:
Use automatically provided `ada` tasks to build your project.
[Run Build Task](command:workbench.action.tasks.build)

steps.title: Configure settings
steps.description:
Configure your Ada development environment.
[Open Ada & SPARK Settings](command:toSide:workbench.action.openWorkspaceSettings?%22%40ext%3Aadacore.ada%22)
[Open Ada & SPARK Keyboard Shortcuts](command:toSide:workbench.action.openGlobalKeybindings?%22%40source%3Aextension%20Ada%20%26%20SPARK%22)

steps.title: Ada & SPARK Extension User's Guide
steps.description:
Discover tutorials, demos, and useful resources in the extension's user guide.
[Open User's Guide](command:toSide:ada.openUsersGuide)

steps.title: Report issues or make contributions
steps.description: This extension is open source software. Feel free to [open an issue](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/issues) or [contribute on GitHub](https://github.com/AdaCore/ada_language_server/pulls)!

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run esbuild-base -- --minify --sourcemap
